title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When new Date() is input as content for three items and saved and previewed, the dynamic text item shows a different format compared to the data and text items.
EB: The dynamic text item should show the same format as the data and text items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item.
2. Set the content of all three items to new Date().
3. Save and preview the page.
